alert.note: Alert for Iron; Madison; St. Francois (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 12 at 9:29PM CDT until July 13 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN IRON...NORTHWESTERN MADISON AND SOUTHWESTERN ST. FRANCOIS COUNTIES IN SOUTHEASTERN MISSOURI... At 928 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Desloge to Bismarck to Belleview, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Law enforcement reported estimated 60 mph and trees down through Desloge. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Farmington, Fredericktown, Ironton, Park Hills, Pilot Knob, Iron Mountain Lake, Arcadia, Knob Lick, Roselle, Catherine Place, Granite, Mine La Motte, Libertyville, and Doe Run. This also includes Fort Davidson Historic Site and Elephant Rocks State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
